subject: Land Acquisition & Construction of way-side Amenities (WSAs)/Rest Areas and identification of monetizable land parcels in the projects (Not yet awarded)
text: IRav <lv  RTTHNf nifearu 794 / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sm 4arv a {rtArf riTT4) 547 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4i-5 Q 6, #qer-10, aRq , T fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6,Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/DPR Consultant IWayside Amenities/20zo Policy Circular No.9.5.3/2020, Dated 04February, 2020 [Decision taken on the File No.NHAI/HOMWSA/2O19] Sub.: Land Acquisition & Construction of Way-Side Amenities (WSAs)/ Rest Areas and identification of monetizable land parcels in the projects (not awarded): 1_ Land Acquisition & Construction of Way-Side Amenities (WSAs) Rest Areas; DPR Consultants propose the land parcels along the highways for the purposes of constructing Way-Side Amenities   (WSA)/ Rest Areas in civil works/   projects and accordingly, WSAs/ Rest Areas are being included in the project facilities (Schedule-C) of the contracts for construction and operation by Concessionaires/ Contractors, as per relevant Clauses of  4/6-laning Manuals viz IRC:SP-84 and IRC:SP-87 . However , in absence of any standard design / layout of WSA/ Rest Areas with the Concessionaires/ Contractors, such facilities may not be developed to the desired standards & specifications. Therefore, it has been decided as under: (i) WSAs/ Rest Areas in the projects under implementation, but coristruction is to start or in the projects recently awarded or bids received: the layout / design of WSA/ Rest  Area may be immediately approved  from Highway Operations Division at NHAI, HQ by the Technical Divisions and conveyed to Contractor / Concessionaire through PD. (ii) WSAs/ Rest Areas being planned in the projects not yet awarded, but bids invited: the provision of WSAs/ Rest Areas may be dropped by amending bidding documents: The details of land acquired for WSAs/ Rest Areas may be informed to Highway Operations Division to take further action to construct & operate such WSAs/ Rest Areas. (iii) WSAs/ Rest Areas being planned in future projects it shall be ensured that the land parcels being acquired for WSAs/ Rest  Areas, as part of DPR preparation, have commercial potential, duly giving due consideration of present and future growth potential of such sites: The details of such sites being acquired for the purpose of WSAs/ Rest Areas should be furnished to Highway Operations Division at NHAI, HQ to take further action to construct & operate WSAs/ Rest Areas. The development  of WSAs/ Rest Areas shall not be included in the project except for expressway/ green field projects where a Consultant is already assisting in development of WSAs/ Rest Areas  2_ Identification of monetizable land parcels in the projects (not yet awarded) CGM (T) at HQ and ROs shall review all ongoing DPRs and identify monetizable land parcels useful for commercial exploitation in future by NHAI and inform the MM R 7 W7 NHAI yet yet got good such
